messages.subject: The correct link to our homeschool blog.
messages.msgSnippet: http://tracyw.wordpress.com/ This is my blog. Finally updated and with the correct address. Look forward to all the feedback I can get. This is my first blog.
messages.messageBody:
http://tracyw.wordpress.com/

This is my blog. Finally updated and with the correct address. Look forward to all the feedback I can get. This is my first blog. I am a member of a lot of homeschool groups, so if you leave a comment, please let me know which group you are from so I can reply to you!
Oh yeah, and there's suppose to be a way to add this link to the resource page of each group, but I don't know how. Anyone with that ability, please feel free to do so. Don't forget to check out archives.
Looking forward to getting to know you all a bit better through this blog.
Tracy in Ohio
Mom of Sadie and Foster parent.
God Bless


---------------------------------
